SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.model

Class Puzzle

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.model.Puzzle
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoardSubject, ITreeSubject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Battleship, Binary, Fillapix, Heyawake, LightUp, Masyu, Minesweeper, Nurikabe, ShortTruthTable, Skyscrapers, StarBattle, Sudoku, Thermometer, TreeTent
public abstract class Puzzle extends Object implements IBoardSubject, ITreeSubject
Abstract class representing a puzzle. The Puzzle class manages the core components of a puzzle game, including the board, rules, and elements. It also handles importing and exporting puzzle configurations and notifies listeners about changes.

    • addBoardListener

      public void addBoardListener(IBoardListener listener)
      Adds a board listener to the list of listeners. This allows the puzzle to notify the listener about changes to the board.
      Specified by:
      addBoardListener in interface IBoardSubject
      Parameters:
      listener - The IBoardListener to be added to the list of listeners.

    • removeBoardListener

      public void removeBoardListener(IBoardListener listener)
      Removes a board listener from the list of listeners. This prevents the puzzle from notifying the listener about future changes to the board.
      Specified by:
      removeBoardListener in interface IBoardSubject
      Parameters:
      listener - The IBoardListener to be removed from the list of listeners.

    • notifyBoardListeners

      public void notifyBoardListeners(Consumer<? super IBoardListener> algorithm)
      Notifies all registered board listeners about changes. The provided algorithm is applied to each listener to process the notification.
      Specified by:
      notifyBoardListeners in interface IBoardSubject
      Parameters:
      algorithm - A Consumer function that takes an IBoardListener and performs operations to notify the listener.

    • addTreeListener

      public void addTreeListener(ITreeListener listener)
      Adds a tree listener to the list of listeners. This allows the puzzle to notify the listener about changes to the tree.
      Specified by:
      addTreeListener in interface ITreeSubject
      Parameters:
      listener - The ITreeListener to be added to the list of listeners.

    • removeTreeListener

      public void removeTreeListener(ITreeListener listener)

      Specified by:
      removeTreeListener in interface ITreeSubject
      Parameters:
      listener - The ITreeListener to be removed from the list of listeners.

    • checkValidity

      public boolean checkValidity()
      Checks if the puzzle is valid. The implementation of this method can vary based on the specific criteria for puzzle validity.
      Returns:
      true if the puzzle is valid, false otherwise.
